FLAVOURTEXT.LOCALISED_TEXT: From the highest tiers of Dawn’s Light Palace to the deepest shade of Wren’s Run, the silver notes of the horn shimmer through the air, and all who hear it feel its pull.

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local token_count = 1 if token_count > 0 then MTG():PutTokensIntoPlay( "TOKEN_ELF_WARRIOR_1_1_280316", token_count, EffectController() ) end
